sub_title: Accounting and Reporting Analyst  na Eni International B.V.
summary:
Career objective: 
To succeed in an environment of growth and excellence by working on a challenging assignment which will provide me an opportunity for growth, enhancement of professional skills, career advancement and self-development.

education.degree_name: Professional Master's Degree in Finance and Controlling

profile_positions.description:
- Financial statements preparation
- Performing budgets and forecasts  
- Preparation of management reporting (Hyperion) to the HQ following IFRS and US GAAP procedures
- General ledger analysis in SAP in accordance with Netherlands IFRS and GAAP
- Monthly accruals analysis and preparation according to the contracts
- Exchange differences realignment execution
- Cost allocation preparation
- Issuing the billing to partners (considering overhead and cut-back) 
- Intercompany reconciliation;
- Monthly financial position and cash flow forecast
- Third-party costs and Capex analysis
- VAT analysis, VAT exemption and withhold taxes from branches 
- Other ad-hoc company reports as required by the group
- Supporting the department with the internal and external audit
profile_positions.title: Accounting and Reporting Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Checking accuracy of invoices upon receipt
- Booking payable and receivable invoices and other general ledger transactions
- Intercompany reconciliation of the accounting records for the reporting of the Group
- Reporting obligations to the Dutch Central Bank; Provide support to the Dutch VAT (BTW) reporting
- Providing support in checking the settlement of receipts related to the sales, joint venture receipts or other receipts upon request;
- Preparation of recharge invoices to Joint Ventures
- Support the year end's audit process
- Cooperating and liaising with the Branches on day to day operations 
- Ensuring timely completion of all the accounting activities
profile_positions.title: AP / AR accountant

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for Treasury operations (input payment orders, investments of surplus funds or borrowing of funds, foreign exchange transactions and solving daily issues)
- Booking the monthly transactions in SAP
- Facilitating the cash management within the group company by preparing cash flow, forecast and daily financial position  
- Performing the intercompany financial reconciliations 
- Support the year end's the audit process
profile_positions.title: Treasury Accountant

profile_positions.description:
- Working closely with the CEO setting financial and administrative goals, managing processes and supporting operational tasks
- Performing corporate month-end reporting
- Maintaining the general ledger, ensuring compliance with Belgian GAAP
- Preparing the reports of forecast financial position
- Balance sheet reconciliations such as: inventory, suppliers, customers, short and long term’s loans, and other
- Responsible for calculating the foreign exchange rate on loans and its associated interest rates and foreign supplier’s feedstock (steel coil)
- Performing inventory reconciliation
- Supervising the annual audits (internal and external)
- Liaised with head quarter and local brokers for company’s insurance policies
- Preparing customers and suppliers reconciliations, issuing invoices and determining payment schedules
- Following up directly with customs about importing process with the outsourced trading company (preparing the import tax calculation, invoices, shipment processes and all associated costs)
profile_positions.title: Financial & Administrative Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
- Submitting the group’s monthly tax results
- Calculation of taxes over the monthly revenue and taxes payment request
- Responsible for documentation to legislative and statutory returns, including federal, state and municipal taxes and income tax
- Responsible for monthly balance sheet reconciliations of tax ledger accounts
- Thorough knowledge of tax laws and the procedures for filing the tax returns and maintaining consistency with the protocols
- Supporting projects that resulted in strong revenue returns
- Working as a "key user" in the upgrade and customisation of SAP ERP for the Tax Department
- Working as “key user” in the migration and implementation of Oracle ERP system, being responsible for Tax Department and supporting other areas involved in the customisation routines
- Annual audits (internal and external) and tax planning support
profile_positions.title: Senior Tax Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for monthly billing and sending invoices to the customers
- Review contract to ensure bills are in compliance with appropriate contracts, guidelines, and regulations
- Created open line of communication between the company and clients
- Responsible for entering the suppliers’ invoices into the accounts payable’s system and the reconciliation of tax accounts
profile_positions.title: Tax Analyst
